item.description: Let's do some karaoke and have an awesome time... My friend Jenni runs the show Friday nights @ Latinos in Bristol. And i must say this place is probably one of my favorite spots on a Friday night for spanish food, drinks, dance and some good fun karaoke. Its really not your regular karaoke spot. It's a mixed crowd with a lot of "flavor" to it. So come on down see what I'm talking about. I strongly believe you won't be disappointed. Stay for dinner and some karaoke. If you don't sing, who cares, come down anyways for a good time. FYI: Kitchen i believe closes at 10. See you Friday September 16 @ Latinos!!! Christian (860) 357-7264
item.name: Dinner + Karaoke Night
